name: Log
documentation: Log to BrowserPlus's logfile on disk. The available levels in order of severity are Fatal, Error, Warn, Info, Debug.

functions.name: Fatal
functions.documentation: Log a fatal error to the Browserplus plugin logging facility.

parameters.name: location
parameters.documentation: The location (e.g. method name) from which the log event is emitted.

functions.name: Error
functions.documentation: Log an error to the Browserplus plugin logging facility.

parameters.name: location
parameters.documentation: The location (e.g. method name) from which the log event is emitted.

functions.name: Warn
functions.documentation: Log a warning to the Browserplus plugin logging facility.

parameters.name: location
parameters.documentation: The location (e.g. method name) from which the log event is emitted.

functions.name: Info
functions.documentation: Log an informational message to the Browserplus plugin logging facility.

parameters.name: location
parameters.documentation: The location (e.g. method name) from which the log event is emitted.

functions.name: Debug
functions.documentation: Log a debug message to the Browserplus plugin logging facility.

parameters.name: location
parameters.documentation: The location (e.g. method name) from which the log event is emitted.
